         test()
         self.assertEqual(dealloc[0], 1)
 
+    def test_out_argument(self):
+        # Gradcheck torch.mul with an out= parameter
+        a = Variable(torch.randn(2, 2), requires_grad=True)
+        b = Variable(torch.randn(2, 2), requires_grad=True)
+
+        def fn(a, b):
+            x = torch.zeros_like(a)
+            torch.mul(a, b, out=x)
+            return x
body:
can't we just do this logic for all the method_tests (if there is an out variant for that function)?

If that will be too slow, I'm happy with any blacklist/whitelist solution you come up with.
